title: Flex recruitment
body:
Hey guys
I am currently needing people to join me for 5 man flex. 
We will use curse or discord to communicate 
If you are interested feel free to let me know. 

Cheers

replies.body: I'm down, add me in game
sounds good, hmu on Discord: Dreamer or League
Sure add me in game, I'll play. Ranked Flex autofill mercenary/main.
